1.0.0.name: wordpress/form-loader-wp
1.0.0.description:
Automatically submits elements of each post to splatforms.com when the post is published.

What is splatforms.com?

From http://splatforms.com/about :

Splatforms.com strives to provide a simple service that allows end users to take the properties of commonly used data entities, or objects, and "do stuff" with them. Currently, we support five (5) distinctly different entity types:

  • Simple Text Messages
  • Links/Bookmarks/URLs/etc
  • News Articles/Blog Entries
  • Calendar Events/Appointments/Meetings/etc and
  • Contacts (People)

Our goal at Splatforms.com is to be the middleman, or broker, that provides the (s)platform through which independently developed applications and tools can route data using a common conduit. We provide third-party developers with tools and APIs that allow them to both populate splatforms (or, as we like to write it, *forms!) on t
